label: Parking lot
info: Arriving at the parking lot of your house, you see these 3 cards on the ground.

label: Front door
info: On the front door, you see these 3 cards.

label: Hall
info: In the hall, you see these 3 cards.

label: Kitchen
info: In the kitchen sink, you see these 3 cards.

label: Living room
info: Passing the living room, you see these 3 cards on the couch.

label: Patio
info: At the patio table, you see these 3 cards.

label: Garden
info: You walk through the garden and see these 3 cards on the bench.

label: Stairway
info: Going up the stairs, you see these 3 cards on the steps.

label: Master bedroom
info: In the master bedroom, you see these 3 cards on the bed.

label: Nursery
info: Checking the baby in the nursery, you see these 3 cards on the changing table.

label: Kids bedroom
info: Greeting the kids bedroom, you see these 3 cards on the desk.

label: Bathroom
info: Ready for a shower in the bathroom, you see these 3 cards on the sink.

label: Attic
info: Your hear a noise in the attic, you go up and see these 3 cards on the floor.

label: Roof
info: Someone is on the roof, you open a window and see these 3 cards.

label: Chimney
info: Climbing up the chimney, you see these 3 cards.

label: Sky
info: You look up at the sky and see these 3 cards.

label: Moon
info: Turning to the moon, you see these 3 cards.

label: Last card
info: The last card is here. Tada!
